abstract: Boy Scouts of America is set to lift ban on openly gay scout leaders and prohibit discrimination based on sexual orientation in all jobs across organization; will include exception to allow church-sponsored units to select leaders who agree with their beliefs on homosexuality.
lead_paragraph: The Boy Scouts of America is poised to change its long-divisive stance, while leaving room for some scouting groups to restrict leadership jobs.
